short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take control over when emails appear in your Gmail. Eliminate interruptions, increase productivity, and reduce stress.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you need time to concentrate and be productive? Are incoming emails a constant distraction for you? This free app is all about how to pause emails in Gmail's inbox (and notifications too!).

Pause Gmail by cloudHQ temporarily pauses new email from coming into your inbox until you’re ready for it, keeping distractions at bay, and keeping you at the top of your game.

Studies show that checking email only a few times a day reduces stress and boosts your work productivity.

✓ Remove interruptions so you can finish important projects
✓ Block off times for deep focus work
✓ Reclaim hours of lost productivity

cloudHQ. Helping your productivity, 1 click at a time.

Website: https://www.pause-gmail.com/
Support page: https://support.cloudhq.net/category/browser-extensions/pause-gmail-inbox/
Blog: https://blog.cloudhq.net
